Based on the search results, Jigisha Arora appears to be a faculty member or researcher at the Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Ropar, with a presence on professional networking platforms such as LinkedIn.
Can you give linkedin profile link of her?

Unfortunately, I couldn't find a direct LinkedIn profile link for Jigisha Arora specifically associated with IIT Ropar. However, I can provide you with some general information on how to find someone's LinkedIn profile or share your own profile link.

According to LinkedIn's help center, you can manage your public profile URL and share it with others. The format of a LinkedIn profile URL typically looks like this: `linkedin.com/in/username`.

If you're looking for Jigisha Arora's profile, you can try searching for her name along with her affiliation (IIT Ropar) on LinkedIn. If you're unable to find her profile, you may want to try reaching out to her or IIT Ropar directly to request her contact information or profile link.
Chandrasekhara Venkata Raman was an Indian physicist who was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1930 for his discovery of the Raman effect, which is the inelastic scattering of light by molecules.
